title: Hi Im colorblind and have a problem realizing which posts are from riot members
body: I cant tell which Comments* are from riot besides the fist. The problem with this is the fist icon is pretty small and on the old forums it was very clear which member worked for riot when they posted due to the rioters name and their profession under their name. Can you guys please do something to make it more clear to which posts are from riot :I pls.

replies.body:
I agree, as a player who isn't colourblind I still have trouble differentiating posts and can totally see where you are coming from.

A suggestion to Riot might be to add a shaded background (of a colour other than red) to their posts which I have seen many other forums on gaming sites use, this makes their post clear and hard to miss. It would technically make the differentiation easier for everyone.

We're considering a few different treatment for red posts. Not sure what's on the drawing board, so I don't want to speculate, but we'll be making changes all the time, and your perspective is incredibly helpful. Thanks for sharing.

Just throw a settings tab up somewhere and give us an actual color blinds mode for the entire website. I would use it. You could also make the Icons a few points larger for the riot members so their icons stick out more.

Personally, I'd prefer the *default* be color-blind friendly. If you and others who are color-blind can tell us what doesn't stand out well enough or what doesn't work well for you, it'll help us get there.
Why not just copy how its done on reddit? A nice big riot logo flair.
I actually agree with Ixionas, the reddit icon for riot is very helpful and the fact that it says "RiotMagus" is what helps me out the most
I agree with the Riot Icons point. They are pretty small. Hard to notice.

I like that there are "Riot Comments" on the side of the page.
Helps me out (also colorblind, same problem you have)
One solution would be to give Rioters some kind of border around their post. Just something easily distinguishable that only relies on shape and not colour.
I would liek to one up this, simply to know if it's now better for color-blind persons.

Not only as a color blind person, but also it's nice to see what a red's title is within the company.  Riot has always been very community involved, and I feel part of that is the personability that the Reds have with their open interaction.  this includes them having a personal icon, in addition to their job title posted up.

Riot posts seem to have a fist next to them? Or am I mistaken? 

It would seem you could glance slightly to the left and see a fist and differentiate.

Xpost from another thread seems more relevant here

I have noticed that my brothers computer has a bit trouble discerning the different posts because his GFXcard and moniter can't show lighter grays and whites clearly. For him the posts all appear white. Riot if you decide to use this direct reply style make sure low end specs can trace the different posts.
Echoing this.  I'm colorblind as well and it's seriously impossible to distinguish right now.
You can tell which are Riot posts by which ones have the abnormally high amount of upvotes.
